mapper.sql: num, writer, title, content, viewcount, updatedat, createdat

choose.when: where title Like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content Like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT , LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM posts ) result1 WHERE num=#{num}

select * from (select result1.*, rowNum as rnum from (select from posts
order by num desc) result1) where rnum between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: insert into posts (num, writer, title, content) values(#{num}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
